sentences.en: 'I never saw you do it yet,'muttered Carton.
sentences.cn: “ 我倒还没见过你受谁欢迎呢, ”卡尔顿喃喃地说.

sentences.en: 'Yes,'said Carton, pausing again, and answering over his shoulder.
sentences.cn: “ 是英国人, ”卡尔顿再次停步, 回头作答.

sentences.en: A carton of milk lay on its side.
sentences.cn: 一盒牛奶放在它的旁边。

sentences.en: Can I turn it to no good account for yourself, Mr. Carton?'
sentences.cn: 我能不能使这事对你有好处呢, 卡尔顿先生? ”

sentences.en: Carton , with his right hand in his breast, stood close beside him.
sentences.cn: 卡尔顿右手放在前襟里, 逼近他站着.

sentences.en: Carton, standing over him with his hand in his breast, looked down.
sentences.cn: 卡尔顿一只手插在前襟里, 低头望着他.

sentences.en: Carton, still drinking the punch, rejoined,'Why should I be astonished?'
sentences.cn: 卡尔顿仍然喝着五味酒, 回答道, “ 我为什么要大吃一惊? ”

sentences.en: Carton, still drinking the punch, rejoined,'Why should I not approve?'
sentences.cn: 卡尔顿仍然喝着五味酒, 回答道, “ 我为什么要不赞成? ”

sentences.en: Carton's hand moved back to his breast no more.
sentences.cn: 卡尔顿的手再也不回到前襟里.

sentences.en: Mr. Carton's manner was so careless as to be almost insolent.
sentences.cn: 卡尔顿先生一副满不在乎的神气,几乎有点无礼.

sentences.en: She was so thirsty that she drank a carton of orange juice.
sentences.cn: 她渴极了,喝了一纸杯桔汁.

sentences.en: Sydney Carton crossed the Seine again for the lighter streets.
sentences.cn: 他再度行过了塞纳河,踏入了灯光较为明亮的市街.

sentences.en: Sydney Carton paused in the street, not quite decided where to go.
sentences.cn: 西德尼-卡尔顿在街头站住了.他不知道往哪里走.

sentences.en: The echoes rarely answered to the actual tread of Sydney Carton.
sentences.cn: 回声很少反应西德尼-卡尔顿的实际脚步.

sentences.en: Those boxes contain the archives of The New Yorker for the years 1925 to 1980.
sentences.cn: 那些纸箱里装着1925年到1980年的《纽约客》杂志存档。

sentences.en: When the postal clerk delivers your order, check the carton before signing for it.
sentences.cn: 你订购的货物由邮政人员送达时，要先检查一下包装盒再签收。

words.tran_cn: 地图制作，制图；制图学，绘图法

phrases.tran_cn: 纸箱；硬纸盒；纸箱抗压机
马斯特箱；标准纸箱；大箱；外箱

trans.tran_cn: （装食物或饮料的）塑料盒，硬纸盒，硬纸箱
trans.tran_en: A carton is a large, strong cardboard box in which goods are stored and transported
